title: Looking to form a new community group

embed.description: Crusaders of Runeterra. 5 likes. Hey Guys, We are a community Group for people who want to play League of legends. Rules no raging, trolling, or rage...

body:
Hey Guys,

I am looking to form a community group with players who don't rage, troll, intentionally throw games, intentionally feed or abuse.

We have a team-speak server to make communicating easier. 

If you are looking to make new friends while having fun please feel free to add Crusaders of Runeterra on facebook.
https://www.facebook.com/crusadersofruneterra 

Everyone is welcome :)
